examples.example: 生活中无论事情大小，我们都应该认真对待。

translate.english: In life, no matter the size of things, we should treat them seriously.

examples.example: 这所学校里的孩子们无论年龄大小，都相处得十分融洽。

translate.english: The children in this school, regardless of their age, get along very well with each other.

examples.example: 这个世界无论大小事物，都有其存在的意义和价值。

translate.english: Everything in this world, no matter big or small, has its own meaning and value for existence.
